abstract: The consumer company has faced a string of manufacturing problems that have tarnished its image as one of the most trusted brands.
snippet: The consumer company has faced a string of manufacturing problems that have tarnished its image as one of the most trusted brands.
lead_paragraph: After years of struggling to improve its image after major quality lapses, the consumer giant Johnson & Johnson announced two recalls of well-known products in the space of a week, raising questions about the extent to which it has moved on from its past problems.

headline.main: New Recalls by Johnson & Johnson Raise Concern About Quality Control Improvements
headline.print_headline: New Recalls by Johnson & Johnson Raise Concern About Quality Control Improvements
